lines.text: My old man used to say, "Take a pan of water, put some coffee in it, boil it, throw a horseshoe in it. If the horseshoe sinks, add more coffee.
I'm not getting myself killed for nothing!

[as they are preparing to blow up a rockslide]
It's too bad you can't hear the biggest explosion in Texas
[points at his eyes and then mimics a gigantic explosion]
I can't understand why the you want to die. Maybe I'm nobody, but I like being alive.
